tagline-1: Donate to support the future of free assets and unlock The Vaults.
tagline-2: Available in Early Access to Patreon supporters, released freely when their goal is met.
how-it-works-p1: Poly Haven creates free and public domain 3D assets. To help fund our work, we have locked some new collections of assets behind a temporary paywall: The Vaults.
how-it-works-p2: Each Vault has a specific funding goal, defined by a target number of <patreonLink>Patreon</patreonLink> members. Once this goal is reached, the Vault is released freely for everyone.
how-it-works-p3: For example, the next Vault, <vaultLink>{{vaultName}}</vaultLink>, contains {{assetsCount}} assets and will be unlocked once we reach {{target}} total patrons ({{remaining}} to go!).
how-it-works-p4: Until then, support us on Patreon to access the content inside all the Vaults.
how-it-works-p5: Not only do you get immediate access to all {{numAssets}} vaulted assets, but you also help release them for free to the public more quickly.
how-it-works-p6: All funding goes towards creating more assets - see our <financeLink>finance reports</financeLink>.
donation-heading: Donate $3+ per month to unlock {{numAssets}} assets and support our work.
what-is-vault-answer: A Vault is a collection of assets that are temporarily locked away until we reach a funding goal. Once the goal is reached, the Vault is released freely for everyone.
all-future-locked: Are all your future assets going to be locked in a Vault?
all-future-locked-p1: No! We are still publishing new free assets in addition to the Vaults - about one new asset every week day.
all-future-locked-p2: The Vaults are in addition to our regular free content, not a replacement.
all-future-locked-p3: Similarly, all of our community projects and donated assets will always be immediately free to the public. Only large collections that require significant investment to create ourselves may be locked in a Vault.
all-future-locked-p4: And remember, every asset (even those in the Vaults) will eventually be free for everyone.
how-to-access: How do I access the Vaults?
how-to-access-p1: You need to support us on <patreonLink>Patreon</patreonLink> with at least $3 per month. Once you become a patron, you will receive access to all the assets inside all of the Vaults.
how-to-access-p2: On this website, simply <loginLink>log in</loginLink> with your Patreon account, and you will be able to download the assets.
how-to-access-p3: In <blenderLink>our Blender add-on</blenderLink>, the vaulted assets will automatically be downloaded when you click "Fetch Assets".
is-crowdfunding: Is this like a crowdfunding project or Patreon goal?
is-crowdfunding-p1: In a way, yes. In the past, we tried both Patreon goals and crowdfunding campaigns, with the promise that once we reached the funding goal we would start working on the project.
is-crowdfunding-p2: This is similar, except we work on the project up front before the funding goal is reached, trusting that our community will support us and cover the funds later over time.
is-crowdfunding-p3: While we have to pay for the development costs up front, this way we can work on more projects sooner, and reward our supporters with early access before the funding goal is met. Nobody can be disappointed by unfulfilled promises, and we can release the assets for free as soon as the goal is met.
what-happens-release: What happens when a Vault is released?
what-happens-release-p1: All the assets inside the Vault are made freely available to everyone as soon as the goal is reached. This means that anyone can download and use the assets without any restrictions.
what-happens-release-p2: Once a Vault is released, it will remain free and public domain forever.
what-happens-release-p3: We will anounce the release on Patreon, as well as social media. The Vault page will be removed, and the assets will become available for free download.
what-happens-release-p4: Some Vaults may turn into a <collectionLink>collection</collectionLink>, while others simply merge into the main library.
what-if-no-goal: What if we don't reach the funding goals?
what-if-no-goal-p1: The Vaults will remain locked until the target number of patrons is reached.
what-if-no-goal-p2: If a Vault remains locked for a such a long time that we are ready to upload another Vault, we will consider adjusting the goals to avoid having too many locked Vaults at once.
what-if-no-goal-p3: Our aim is to make all assets freely available eventually, but we rely on the support of our community to make this possible. Your contributions help us continue creating free high-quality content for everyone.
what-license: What is the license of the Vaulted assets?
what-license-answer: Like the rest of our library, all assets in the Vaults are <licenseLink>CC0</licenseLink>.
